process.name: soiltemperature_process
process.description: Multilayer soil temperature and surface energy balance step with radiative forcing and atmospheric boundary layer conductance, updating node temperatures and related heat properties.

inputs.name: physical_Thickness
inputs.description: Soil layer thicknesses

inputs.name: physical_BD
inputs.description: Soil bulk density by layer

inputs.name: physical_Rocks
inputs.description: Rock fragment percentage by layer

inputs.name: physical_ParticleSizeSand
inputs.description: Sand fraction percentage by layer

inputs.name: physical_ParticleSizeSilt
inputs.description: Silt fraction percentage by layer

inputs.name: physical_ParticleSizeClay
inputs.description: Clay fraction percentage by layer

inputs.name: organic_Carbon
inputs.description: Organic carbon percentage by layer

inputs.name: waterBalance_SW
inputs.description: Volumetric soil water content by layer

inputs.name: waterBalance_Es
inputs.description: Soil evaporation rate

inputs.name: waterBalance_Eos
inputs.description: Potential soil evaporation (bare soil)

inputs.name: waterBalance_Eo
inputs.description: Potential evapotranspiration

inputs.name: waterBalance_Salb
inputs.description: Bare-soil albedo

inputs.name: weather_Tav
inputs.description: Average annual soil surface temperature baseline

inputs.name: weather_Amp
inputs.description: Annual temperature amplitude at soil surface

inputs.name: weather_Latitude
inputs.description: Site latitude

inputs.name: weather_MeanT
inputs.description: Daily mean air temperature

inputs.name: weather_MaxT
inputs.description: Daily maximum air temperature

inputs.name: weather_MinT
inputs.description: Daily minimum air temperature

inputs.name: weather_Radn
inputs.description: Daily incoming shortwave radiation

inputs.name: weather_AirPressure
inputs.description: Air pressure

inputs.name: weather_Wind
inputs.description: Wind speed at instrument height

inputs.name: clock_Today_DayOfYear
inputs.description: Day of year

inputs.name: microClimate_CanopyHeight
inputs.description: Canopy height

inputs.name: instrumHeight
inputs.description: Instrument height above ground (optional override)

inputs.name: DepthToConstantTemperature
inputs.description: Depth to lower boundary with constant temperature

inputs.name: InitialValues
inputs.description: Optional initial soil temperature profile for layers (topsoil node onwards)

inputs.name: defaultTimeOfMaximumTemperature
inputs.description: Default hour of day of maximum air temperature

inputs.name: timestep_seconds
inputs.description: External model time step

inputs.name: doInitialisationStuff
inputs.description: Flag to run one-time initialization in first process call

inputs.name: internalTimeStep
inputs.description: Internal integration time step (seconds)

inputs.name: timeOfDaySecs
inputs.description: Current internal time-of-day seconds within daily loop

inputs.name: numNodes
inputs.description: Total number of temperature nodes (layers plus phantom nodes)

inputs.name: numLayers
inputs.description: Number of soil layers in profile

inputs.name: nodeDepth
inputs.description: Depth of each node center from surface

inputs.name: thermCondPar1
inputs.description: Thermal conductivity empirical parameter 1 per element

inputs.name: thermCondPar2
inputs.description: Thermal conductivity empirical parameter 2 per element

inputs.name: thermCondPar3
inputs.description: Thermal conductivity empirical parameter 3 per element

inputs.name: thermCondPar4
inputs.description: Thermal conductivity empirical parameter 4 per element

inputs.name: volSpecHeatSoil
inputs.description: Volumetric specific heat profile at nodes

inputs.name: soilTemp
inputs.description: Soil temperature at nodes including air and surface nodes

inputs.name: morningSoilTemp
inputs.description: Snapshot of soil temperature profile around 5 AM for diagnostics

inputs.name: heatStorage
inputs.description: Node heat storage term (volumetric heat capacity times volume per time step)

inputs.name: thermalConductance
inputs.description: Node conductance (conductivity divided by element length)

inputs.name: thermalConductivity
inputs.description: Thermal conductivity profile mapped to nodes including surface/air node

inputs.name: boundaryLayerConductance
inputs.description: Daily-averaged atmospheric boundary layer conductance at surface node

inputs.name: newTemperature
inputs.description: Working array for new temperature solution at nodes

inputs.name: airTemperature
inputs.description: Current air node temperature used as boundary condition

inputs.name: maxTempYesterday
inputs.description: Yesterday's maximum air temperature for diurnal interpolation

inputs.name: minTempYesterday
inputs.description: Yesterday's minimum air temperature for diurnal interpolation

inputs.name: soilWater
inputs.description: Node or layer soil water content used in heat capacity/conductivity

inputs.name: minSoilTemp
inputs.description: Daily minimum soil temperature per node (accumulator)

inputs.name: maxSoilTemp
inputs.description: Daily maximum soil temperature per node (accumulator)

inputs.name: aveSoilTemp
inputs.description: Daily average soil temperature per node (accumulator)

inputs.name: thickness
inputs.description: Layer thickness array with phantom layers appended

inputs.name: bulkDensity
inputs.description: Bulk density array with phantom layers appended

inputs.name: rocks
inputs.description: Rock fragment percentage with phantom layers appended

inputs.name: carbon
inputs.description: Organic carbon percentage with phantom layers appended

inputs.name: sand
inputs.description: Sand percentage with phantom layers appended

inputs.name: silt
inputs.description: Silt percentage with phantom layers appended

inputs.name: clay
inputs.description: Clay percentage with phantom layers appended

inputs.name: soilRoughnessHeight
inputs.description: Soil surface roughness height used to bound canopy height minimum

inputs.name: instrumentHeight
inputs.description: Instrument height used for micrometeorological calculations

inputs.name: netRadiation
inputs.description: Net radiation at soil surface per internal step (accumulator/last value)

inputs.name: canopyHeight
inputs.description: Effective canopy height used in aerodynamic calculations

inputs.name: instrumHeight
inputs.description: Original instrument height input stored in state

inputs.name: nu
inputs.description: Crank–Nicolson weighting factor for implicit scheme

inputs.name: boundarLayerConductanceSource
inputs.description: Source mode for boundary layer conductance (calc or constant)

inputs.name: netRadiationSource
inputs.description: Source mode for net radiation (calc or Eos-derived)

inputs.name: InitialValues
inputs.description: Stored initial layer temperatures (if provided)

inputs.name: defaultTimeOfMaximumTemperature
inputs.description: Stored default hour of maximum air temperature

inputs.name: DepthToConstantTemperature
inputs.description: Stored lower boundary depth with constant temperature

inputs.name: timestep
inputs.description: Stored external model time step used internally

inputs.name: pom
inputs.description: Particle organic matter density parameter

inputs.name: ps
inputs.description: Particle solid density parameter (minerals)

inputs.name: soilConstituentNames
inputs.description: List of soil constituent names for mixture rules

outputs.name: doInitialisationStuff
outputs.description: Flag to run one-time initialization in first process call

outputs.name: internalTimeStep
outputs.description: Internal integration time step (seconds)

outputs.name: timeOfDaySecs
outputs.description: Current internal time-of-day seconds within daily loop

outputs.name: nodeDepth
outputs.description: Depth of each node center from surface

outputs.name: thermCondPar1
outputs.description: Thermal conductivity empirical parameter 1 per element

outputs.name: thermCondPar2
outputs.description: Thermal conductivity empirical parameter 2 per element

outputs.name: thermCondPar3
outputs.description: Thermal conductivity empirical parameter 3 per element

outputs.name: thermCondPar4
outputs.description: Thermal conductivity empirical parameter 4 per element

outputs.name: volSpecHeatSoil
outputs.description: Volumetric specific heat profile at nodes

outputs.name: soilTemp
outputs.description: Soil temperature at nodes including air and surface nodes

outputs.name: morningSoilTemp
outputs.description: Snapshot of soil temperature profile around 5 AM for diagnostics

outputs.name: heatStorage
outputs.description: Node heat storage term (volumetric heat capacity times volume per time step)

outputs.name: thermalConductance
outputs.description: Node conductance (conductivity divided by element length)

outputs.name: thermalConductivity
outputs.description: Thermal conductivity profile mapped to nodes including surface/air node

outputs.name: boundaryLayerConductance
outputs.description: Daily-averaged atmospheric boundary layer conductance at surface node

outputs.name: newTemperature
outputs.description: Working array for new temperature solution at nodes

outputs.name: airTemperature
outputs.description: Current air node temperature used as boundary condition

outputs.name: maxTempYesterday
outputs.description: Yesterday's maximum air temperature for diurnal interpolation

outputs.name: minTempYesterday
outputs.description: Yesterday's minimum air temperature for diurnal interpolation

outputs.name: soilWater
outputs.description: Node or layer soil water content used in heat capacity/conductivity

outputs.name: minSoilTemp
outputs.description: Daily minimum soil temperature per node (accumulator)

outputs.name: maxSoilTemp
outputs.description: Daily maximum soil temperature per node (accumulator)

outputs.name: aveSoilTemp
outputs.description: Daily average soil temperature per node (accumulator)

outputs.name: thickness
outputs.description: Layer thickness array with phantom layers appended

outputs.name: bulkDensity
outputs.description: Bulk density array with phantom layers appended

outputs.name: rocks
outputs.description: Rock fragment percentage with phantom layers appended

outputs.name: carbon
outputs.description: Organic carbon percentage with phantom layers appended

outputs.name: sand
outputs.description: Sand percentage with phantom layers appended

outputs.name: silt
outputs.description: Silt percentage with phantom layers appended

outputs.name: clay
outputs.description: Clay percentage with phantom layers appended

outputs.name: soilRoughnessHeight
outputs.description: Soil surface roughness height used to bound canopy height minimum

outputs.name: instrumentHeight
outputs.description: Instrument height used for micrometeorological calculations

outputs.name: netRadiation
outputs.description: Net radiation at soil surface per internal step (accumulator/last value)

outputs.name: canopyHeight
outputs.description: Effective canopy height used in aerodynamic calculations

outputs.name: instrumHeight
outputs.description: Original instrument height input stored in state

outputs.name: nu
outputs.description: Crank–Nicolson weighting factor for implicit scheme

outputs.name: boundarLayerConductanceSource
outputs.description: Source mode for boundary layer conductance (calc or constant)

outputs.name: netRadiationSource
outputs.description: Source mode for net radiation (calc or Eos-derived)

outputs.name: InitialValues
outputs.description: Stored initial layer temperatures (if provided)

outputs.name: defaultTimeOfMaximumTemperature
outputs.description: Stored default hour of maximum air temperature

outputs.name: DepthToConstantTemperature
outputs.description: Stored lower boundary depth with constant temperature

outputs.name: timestep
outputs.description: Stored external model time step used internally

outputs.name: pom
outputs.description: Particle organic matter density parameter

outputs.name: ps
outputs.description: Particle solid density parameter (minerals)

outputs.name: soilConstituentNames
outputs.description: List of soil constituent names for mixture rules

functions.name: Divide
functions.description: Safe division with fallback value when divisor is zero.

functions.name: ValuesInArray
functions.description: Checks if an array contains any valid (non-sentinel) values.

functions.name: Sum
functions.description: Sums values in a list between start and end indices ignoring sentinel.

functions.name: Zero
functions.description: Sets all elements of an array to zero.

functions.name: ToCumThickness
functions.description: Computes cumulative thickness from layer thickness array.

functions.name: kelvinT
functions.description: Converts Celsius to Kelvin.

functions.name: volumetricSpecificHeat
functions.description: Returns constituent volumetric specific heat constant by name.

functions.name: volumetricFractionRocks
functions.description: Computes volumetric fraction of rocks by layer.

functions.name: volumetricFractionOrganicMatter
functions.description: Computes volumetric fraction of organic matter by layer.

functions.name: volumetricFractionSand
functions.description: Computes volumetric fraction of sand by layer.

functions.name: volumetricFractionSilt
functions.description: Computes volumetric fraction of silt by layer.

functions.name: volumetricFractionClay
functions.description: Computes volumetric fraction of clay by layer.

functions.name: volumetricFractionWater
functions.description: Computes volumetric fraction of water by layer.

functions.name: volumetricFractionIce
functions.description: Returns volumetric fraction of ice (here 0).

functions.name: volumetricFractionAir
functions.description: Computes volumetric fraction of air by layer as residue.

functions.name: ThermalConductance
functions.description: Returns thermal conductance parameter per constituent (preserving original behavior).

functions.name: shapeFactor
functions.description: Returns shape factor per constituent (preserving original behavior).

functions.name: airDensity
functions.description: Computes air density from temperature and pressure.

functions.name: mapLayer2Node
functions.description: Maps layer-based arrays to node-based arrays via depth-weighted interpolation.

functions.name: doThermalConductivityCoeffs
functions.description: Computes empirical thermal conductivity coefficients per element.

functions.name: calcSoilTemperature
functions.description: Computes initial seasonal soil temperature profile by depth.

functions.name: interpolateTemperature
functions.description: Interpolates hourly air temperature over the diurnal cycle.

functions.name: longWaveRadn
functions.description: Computes longwave radiation from emissivity and temperature.

functions.name: doNetRadiation
functions.description: Partitions daily radiation into sub-daily solar radiation and cloud factor.

functions.name: interpolateNetRadiation
functions.description: Computes net radiation at soil surface for an internal time step.

functions.name: calcSurfaceTemperature
functions.description: Estimates soil surface temperature from albedo, mean and max air temperature, and radiation.

functions.name: doVolumetricSpecificHeat
functions.description: Computes node volumetric specific heat using constituent list and soil water.

functions.name: doThermalConductivity
functions.description: Computes node thermal conductivity using mixture rules and maps to nodes.

functions.name: doThomas
functions.description: Thomas algorithm solver for 1D heat diffusion tridiagonal system with surface flux boundary.

functions.name: getBoundaryLayerConductance
functions.description: Computes atmospheric boundary layer conductance with stability corrections.

functions.name: math_sin
functions.description: Wrapper for math.sin.

functions.name: math_cos
functions.description: Wrapper for math.cos.

functions.name: math_exp
functions.description: Wrapper for math.exp.

functions.name: math_log
functions.description: Wrapper for math.log.
